text: @JoyAnnReid @kasie Exactly, why is it in the bill???    Why would the @DNC put #abortions in a #CoronaOutbreak bill.   @SpeakerPelosi is using the #coronapocalypse to get everything passed that she never could outside of this.    #TrumpDerangementSyndrome
